metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14288 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an Integer overflow in the function JBIG2Bitmap::combine at JBIG2Stream.cc for the "one byte per line" case.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 ebarretto> since 0.5.12-1 libextractor does not use xpdf anymore. mdeslaur> in poppler, this is CVE-2017-9776 ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
